scripts.gen: yarn gen:createTypes && yarn gen:convertTypes && yarn gen:generateTypes && yarn gen:fixTypes
scripts.pub:whale: git pull && cd ./packages/whale && npm version patch && yarn build && cd ../../build/whale && npm publish --access public && cd .. && rm -rf ./whale
scripts.pub:core: git pull && cd ./packages/core && npm version patch && yarn build && cd ../../build/core && npm publish --access public && cd .. && rm -rf ./core
scripts.pub:lab: git pull && cd ./packages/lab && npm version patch && yarn build && cd ../../build/lab && npm publish --access public && cd .. && rm -rf ./lab
